tool_description:
An API specifically made for birthday celebrant programmers..

Do not subscribe to this API if today is not your Birthday and if you are not lonely!

It must be, birthday + lonely. 

If you will subscribe, it will be a lonely birthday XD

Peace Yowww.
name: Happy Birthday API
title: Happy Birthday API

api_list.name: Greet me Cuz it's my Birthday and I'm lonely!
api_list.description: Greets you a happy birthday with a fun lie, not fun fact cuz it is overused.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://happy-birthday-api.p.rapidapi.com/prod/programmers-birthday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "happy-birthday-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://happy-birthday-api.p.rapidapi.com/prod/programmers-birthday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "happy-birthday-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
